entries.title: Restart Systray
entries.command: gnome-extensions disable trayIconsReloaded@selfmade.pl && gnome-extensions enable trayIconsReloaded@selfmade.pl

entries.title: Restart This Menu
entries.command: gnome-extensions disable custom-menu-panel@AndreaBenini && gnome-extensions enable custom-menu-panel@AndreaBenini
